articles.title: Trinamool's Partha Chatterjee, His Aide Sent To Jail For 14 Days
articles.description: Arrested Trinamool Congress leader Partha Chatterjee and his aide Arpita Mukherjee have been sent to jail for 14 days in the School Service Commission appointments scam case. The next hearing is on August 18.
